name: Land Of The First Dream (demo)
description:
This is a short prototype, a fun idea I had for a game. I'll try to update it regularly if people find it interesting enough. Have fun !

HP = health point, STR = damage of basic attack, WIS = damage of most spells, CON = Timer for the tetris phase

arrow keys = move tetrominos

up key = rotate or launch attacks

down key = fall faster

space = select

PS: Known bug, don't use your mouse when in combat...
